doc.field: New York Bureau of Legal Advice Records
New York Bureau of Legal Advice Records
Series IV: Case Files: Conscientious Objector Files
Series IV: Case Files: Conscientious Objector Files

The Conscientious Objectors files include correspondence with the CO's and with their families as well as affidavits, court martial records, and correspondence with military officials. Subjects of correspondence include lobbying campaigns, prison brutality, strikes and hunger strikes by prisoners, and the progress of cases. There are also files on the military camps where the COs were incarcerated and photographs of COs at Camp Dix and Fort Riley, Kansas.
